privacy.title: Ai Lazy Pack Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Ai Lazy Pack (the "Service") collects, uses, stores, shares, and protects your data. By using or continuing to use the Service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to this Policy. If you disagree, please do not use the Service.

content.text: This Policy applies when you use the Service (mobile apps, website, or API). It does not cover your interactions with third parties or their privacy practices (such as external AI providers, payment processors, or cloud services).
We collect only the minimum data necessary to provide the Service, typically including:

items: Device and technical information (which may be anonymized): such as system version, device model, language, and approximate region; used to prevent abuse, manage security risks, and enhance stability.
Usage records: such as conversation counts, feature usage, coin top-up and spending history, and error logs; used to deliver and maintain features, troubleshoot issues, and provide support.
Content you submit: text, files, or other materials you provide within the Service ("User Content"), used solely to generate responses and deliver the requested functionality.

content.text: We do not intentionally collect your real name, identification numbers, precise geolocation, bank card numbers, or unnecessary personally identifiable information. Payments are processed by third-party providers; we do not access or store your full payment card details.

items: To provide, operate, and improve the Service (for example, generating AI responses, calculating usage, and detecting anomalies).
To prevent abuse, fraud, or security incidents (for example, bypassing free quotas or attacking systems).
To comply with legal obligations or protect users and public safety.
To conduct anonymized and aggregated analytics (not identifying individual users) for experience and performance improvements.

content.text: We may use third-party AI model providers, cloud hosting, or payment services. These third parties operate under their own terms and policies and may be located in jurisdictions different from yours. When you use the Service, your data may be transferred or processed across borders. We interact with third parties only when necessary to deliver functionality and seek contractual safeguards for data protection where feasible.

If the website uses cookies or similar technologies, they are limited to essential purposes such as session maintenance, language preferences, and security. We do not perform behavioral advertising tracking.

items: User content: may be retained briefly to deliver responses and troubleshoot issues, then deleted or anonymized once the purpose is fulfilled.
Usage and transaction records: retained for durations required to prevent abuse, reconcile accounts, or comply with legal obligations, and deleted or anonymized afterward.

content.text: Retention periods vary depending on data type, purpose, legal requirements, and operational needs, following a minimization principle.

We implement reasonable and proportionate technical and organizational measures (such as access controls, encryption, audits, and backups) to protect data. However, no system can guarantee absolute security; you accept the inherent risks of transmitting data over the internet.

The Service is not directed to users under 18. If we learn that a minor has submitted data or used the Service, we will take reasonable steps to restrict access and delete the data or account when necessary.

Subject to applicable laws (such as GDPR, PDPA, CCPA, PDPO, etc.), you may have rights to access, correct, delete, restrict processing, receive a copy, object to processing, or withdraw consent. We respond within a reasonable time and handle requests in accordance with the law.
We may require identity verification before processing your request to protect account security.

items: We do not sell your personal data.
We do not share your personal data for cross-site behavioral advertising.
We do not process your data in ways inconsistent with this Policy.

content.text: We typically process data based on at least one legal ground: performing a contract (providing requested features), obtaining your consent, pursuing legitimate interests (operation, anti-fraud, security), or fulfilling legal obligations (responding to authorities).
